name: Mens Big Giant Bar Of Soap Vegan Bar Soap
description:
See the brand new men's scents at the bottom of this listing!

This over sized soap bar is big enough to cut into 2 bars!

The shea butter and glycerin formula is great for extra sensitive skin, and the lather is really rich with a creamy feel to it. It rinses squeeky clean, and the scent will linger for a few hours without being overpowering. I use this daily because I love the thick lather and the scent it leaves on my skin.

Each soap bar is 9-10 Oz's. These are big heavy bars!

To Store: Keep it in as dry a place as possible when not in use. A wire shower rack or a soap dish with drainage is perfect for storage. It's best to keep it out of direct shower spray.

If ordering 2+ bars discounted flat rate shipping is automatically applied to U.S orders. You'll have your order in 2 business days anywhere in the U.S. once shipped. I ship orders daily in the order they are received with a 1-2 business day turn around. 

See all of Red Leafs mens products here:
http://redleafsoap.bigcartel.com/category/mens

NEW SCENTS:

LEATHER: The scent of a black leather jacket, it smells deep and musky. Perfect for a manly man. Very masculine and sensuous.

HI OCTANE: Based on the scent of jet fuel, this fragrance replicates the sharper and higher notes incorporating natural Tea Tree oil. It's musky and smooth, a powerful and sexy scent that's absolutely masculine. You'll be surprised how great this smells.

FIREWOOD: An amazing scent! The smoky and dense smell of burning hardwood. Smoky and deep, it's the perfect scent for Fall and Winter. A sexy, muscular and manly scent that works especially well in all mens products. You won't believe how fantastic this smells. You'll be wanting more of this, believe me!

LO OCTANE: Based on the scent of gasoline, without smelling like gasoline itself. This scent incorporates the higher notes of gasoline and blends those with base notes of sage and rosemary. It's a surprisingly clean scent that smells amazing on the skin. Totally masculine and bold. 

Ingredients: olive oil × shea butter × coconut milk × water × kukui × vegetable glycerin × sodium hydroxide × sweet almond oil × fragrance

name: Mens Travel Shave Soap / Vegan Mens Wet Shaving Soap
description:
See the brand new men's scents at the bottom of this listing!

Get a great shave anytime you're away from home.

An aloe vera based shaving soap packaged in an unbreakable, lightweight, and compact container with a tight fitting screw on lid. It's perfect for travel, the gym, or camping. It fits easily in a shaving kit or small bag and it's TSA compliant.

This rich lathering shaving soap is made for use with a brush and formulated especially for sensitive skin. Oils soften and moisturize your beard, while bentonite clay produces excellent razor slip. Aloe Vera helps skin recover quickly from shaving abrasions.
Each container holds over 3.5+ Oz's of soap.

The shaving soap packaging now comes with a gloss black lid as shown.

LEATHER: The scent of a black leather jacket, it smells deep and musky. Perfect for a manly man. Very masculine and sensuous.

A sexy, muscular and manly scent that works especially well in all mens products. You won't believe how fantastic this smells. You'll be wanting more of this, believe me! 

LO OCTANE: Based on the scent of gasoline, without smelling like gasoline itself. This scent incorporates the higher notes of gasoline and blends those with base notes of sage and rosemary. It's a surprisingly clean scent that smells amazing on the skin. Totally masculine and bold.

aloe vera, palm oil, castor oil, bentonite clay, olive oil, safflower oil, vegetable glycerin, purified water, sodium hydroxide, sorbitan oleate, soybean protein, wheat protein, fragrance

name: Exfoliating Oatmeal Soap Bar Vegan Cold Process Bar Soap
description:
The perfect soap for gently exfoliating skin. 

Olive oil, shea butter, coconut oil and organic oatmeal are combined to make a really rich, creamy lathering bar that's perfect for sensitive skin. 

The oatmeal is ground just long enough to produce medium exfoliation that leaves your skin soft and really smooth without feeling too rough and scratchy. The rich creamy lather leaves your skin soft smelling great. 

The perfect soap for gently exfoliating skin. The bar pictured is in the Oatmeal, Milk and Honey scent, a perfect match for this soap! Each bar is 5+ ounces.

Ingredients:
Olive oil, shea butter, kukui oil, coconut oil, sodium hydroxide, fragrance, essential oils, organic oatmeal

name: Very Concentrated Room Spray, Air Freshener In Aluminum Bottle
description:
Amazingly long lasting room sprays!

These are nothing like typical air freshening sprays found in your local store. They're very concentrated and formulated to last for hours. 

Each aluminum canister will last months with regular use. The matching aluminum sprayer releases a fine mist that travels quickly throughout a large room. Most air freshening sprays are made with water but I use expensive perfumers alcohol because it dries very quickly and disinfects but leaves no alcohol scent behind so all you smell is the fragrance. 

The fragrances I use contain no phthalates and are a combination of essential oils and fragrance oils. Safe around children and pets. 

For best results hold the can high when spraying so the mist travels further. You'll find that 2 or 3 spritzes is all you'll need. 

As a precaution do not spray directly on fabrics from a distance of 8" or closer, and avoid spraying near an open flame.

Ingredients:
Essential oils, perfumers alcohol, fragrance oils

name: Lathering Bath and Shower Sponge
description:
A gentle bath sponge generously drenched with all natural olive oil and glycerin soap.

Each sponge is glazed with 5+ ounces of Red Leafs rich lathering soap that gently cleans while the bath sponge softly exfoliates your skin. Every sponge has its own rope to hang it up with or you can lay it flat on a shower rack to dry.

When the soap is gone you can use the sponge with your favorite body wash or soap. They hold the lather really well!

They're a great gift basket or party favor item, and they're available in all scents. If you're ordering more than one, you can mix and match the scents you'd like.

These have only been available to my wholesale clients until now. They sell out fast in stores, so I decided to stock them in mine. I think you'll love them!

name: Mens Shaving Soap Gift Set With Two Shaving Soap Cubes After Shave Lotion, Groomsmen Gift
description:
See the brand new men's scents at the bottom of this listing!

A coconut oil based shaving soap, and an aloe vera based after shaving lotion in a great gift box!

Each set includes two of the 3.5+ ounce shaving soap cubes, one aloe vera after shaving lotion, and gift box. The cubes are each packaged in individual clear plastic boxes for a great gift presentation. 

Everything fits nicely into the gift box, no wrapping necessary! Discounted flat rate shipping is included on any number of sets purchased. 

The shaving soap cubes are chunky and easy to hold, and the coconut oil formulation gives a clean shave leaving even the most sensitive skin soft and smooth. Each cube is Coconut oil based not glycerin, so they last a nice long time! The lather is thick and creamy and leaves a subtle scent behind. 

The aloe vera based lotion soothes skin better than water based lotions can. It absorbs quickly with no greasy feel and it's light scent isn't overwhelming.

This 3 item gift set is shown in the Black Tea scent, but it can be ordered in any Red Leaf scent.

Need it shipped to the recipient directly? Just contact me!

name: Bubble Bath Dough
description:
Who doesn't love a slow & relaxing bubble bath?

Bubble bath dough has the texture of play dough and makes a lot of sweet smelling bubbles! The natural ingredients are friendly to sensitive skin and leave you feeling soft and smelling wonderful even after drying off. The fragrant bubbles are amazing and last your entire bath!

It's formulated using simple ingredients like baking soda, glycerin and sweet almond oil. There's no SLS, phthalates, or petroleum by-products of any kind. You may be surprised at the strength of the scent when you first open the lid, but the bath water dilutes the scent to a subtle fragrance.

When it's all gone the sturdy container can be reused or recycled.

TO USE:
Turn your bath faucet on full blast! Scoop out a small amount and rub it between your palms under the fully running bath faucet. Agitate water as the tub fills. If you have hard water you might need to use a bit more.

Not a bath person? Use it in the shower and then rinse off. The gently exfoliating lather leaves your skin smooth and clean. 

Ingredients:
sodium bicarbonate, vegetable glycerin, cream of tartar, sodium lauryl sulphoacetate (produces bubbles, derived from coconut), fragrances 

Learn all about it:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MadZsZMpgqg

name: Vegan Ultra Hydrating Facial Spray
description:
A nourishing facial mist that lasts all day. 

It's light and refreshing, but don't be fooled this is serious stuff! It's great for men and women who don't like using lotions. 
 
The Aloe Vera, Grapefruit Seed, and Mango extracts produce outstanding moisturization without heavy oils. The result is smooth skin and an even skin tone without any greasy look or feel.  Once the spray is dry, which takes about a minute, makeup can easily be applied over it. Perfect for extra dry and sensitive skin, it contains no alcohol. 100% vegan.

It rinses off easily with warm water alone and won't clog pores. 

Best applied to very clean skin especially after a shower. Excellent for use after prolonged exposure to the sun and it's TSA compliant. Perfect for frequent travelers exposed to the drying effects of airplane cabin air. 

To use, hold bottle about 6" away from face. Gently pat it into the skin, and let dry for about a minute. 3-4 spritzes is all it takes!

Avoid getting spray in eyes. Keep bottle out of direct sunlight. Each glass bottle is 2 Ozs.

NOTE: For complete scent descriptions click the last thumbnail. 

Ingredients: Distilled water, Organic Aloe Vera Leaf juice, Grapefruit Seed Extract, Mango Extract, Sweet Almond Oil, Polysorbate 20 (derived from coconuts), fragrance.

name: Vegan Shampoo Bar, Solid Bar Shampoo, Travel Shampoo Bar
description:
The shampoo bar that's made to go anywhere you do.

The tight fitting lid stays closed during travel and the sturdy aluminum case is rust proof. No more leaking shampoo bottles!

It's T.S.A. compliant for carry-on so you can lust leave it in your bag for your next trip. Perfect for frequent travelers or to keep at the gym.

Shea butter, coconut milk, and olive oil work together to make a thick but gentle lather leaving your hair soft and shiny with a clean scent that's not overpowering.

To use: Wet hair, then turn the bar over in your wet hands a few times to make a lather and apply. It's usually best to start with a small amount of lather at first and then lather again if necessary.

This is not a detergent as commercial shampoos are, and typically there is an adjustment period for your hair to get used to this new shampoo. Using the bar just a couple times should do it.

I've found that this formula works best for thick, wavy, color treated, or curly to kinky hair.

Keep the bar out of direct shower spray and make sure its almost dry before putting back in the case.

2.5 Oz bar.

Ingredients: coconut oil, palm oil, castor bean, apricot kernel oil, cocoa mango and shea butters, water, olive oil, coconut milk, and sodium hydroxide.

name: Bubble Bath Dough Sample, Travel Sizes, Bath and Body Samples
description:
Cute and sweet! 

These great little tubs hold a generous amount of bubble bath dough, and they're TSA compliant for bubble bath lovers away from home. 

It's the same popular bubble bath dough as in the full sizes. 

Bubble bath dough makes a lot of sweet smelling bubbles! The natural ingredients are friendly to sensitive skin and leave you feeling soft and smelling wonderful even after drying off. The fragrant bubbles are amazing and last your entire bath!

It's formulated using simple ingredients like baking soda, glycerin and sweet almond oil. There's no SLS, phthalates, or petroleum by-products of any kind. 

Making tons of bubbles is a blast for kids that aren't crazy about bath time, and there's no worry about it accidentally spilling. When it's all gone the sturdy reusable container is perfect for storing all sorts of little things.

TO USE:
Turn your bath faucet on full blast! Scoop out a small amount and rub it between your palms under the fully running bath faucet. Agitate water as the tub fills. If you have hard water you might need to use a bit more.

Not a bath person? Use it in the shower and then just rinse off! The gently exfoliating lather leaves your skin smooth and clean. It's the perfect face wash. 

Each sample is 2+ Oz's. 

Full sizes here:
http://redleafsoap.bigcartel.com/product/bubble-bath-dough

name: Mens Vegan Shaving Soap Cubes Mens Shave Soap, Travel Shaving Soap, Groomsmen Gift
description:
See the brand new men's scents at the bottom of this listing!

An easy to use long lasting shaving soap in a convenient cube shape. This is one of Red Leafs most popular products with a dedicated following.

The #1 ingredient is coconut oil with a generous amount of glycerin, so they last for months. The lather is rich & creamy and softens hair stubble quickly while providing outstanding razor slip. It's a really smooth shave!

The chunky cube shape is easy to hold even when wet, and can be applied directly to your skin. I use this cube almost daily and I think it's best used right after a hot shower. I apply it directly to my wet beard and make a thick lather using my wet hands and finger tips. It's a fast and easy way to lather up for a great shave. When your done, a quick rinse of the cube and storage in a dry place is all you need to make your cube last for months.

Each cube weighs 3.5+ ounces and comes packaged in a clear plastic box. Keep soap cube out of standing water.

If you prefer lathering up with a shaving brush, see our container shaving soaps that you can take anywhere you go!

description:
See the brand new men's scents at the bottom of this listing!

A gentle, vegan, after shaving lotion formulated for sensitive skin to soothe your skin from shaving abrasion and small nicks. 

Aloe Vera is the main ingredient in the mens after shave lotion not water, so it's especially healing for just shaved skin. Aloe Vera leaves skin hydrated and helps to quickly heal small cuts and abrasions sometimes caused by shaving. Olive oil & glycerin help to keep skin moisturized for hours after shaving. It's 100% vegan formula is quick to absorb with no greasy feel and it's lightly scented. Unscented too!

Note: This lotion does not contain sunscreen / 6 Oz bottle.

name: Soothing Beeswax Hand and Body Lotion, Gardeners Lotion,  Made for Rough Dry Skin
description:
Perfect for extra dry elbows, knees, and hands. 

I'm amazed at how fast this absorbs and how soon I can handle things without leaving greasy fingerprints behind.

Made with beeswax and Aloe Vera, this is a heavier lotion for really dry, rough skin but it's quick to absorb and non-greasy. An excellent lotion for gardeners, potters, nurses, or anyone who is often washing their hands.

The lotion is now packaged in clear recyclable plastic bottles with black flat top caps. When it's low just store the bottle upside down. No waste!

Note: This lotion does not contain sunscreen! 6 Oz bottle.

Ingredients: Organic Aloe Vera leaf Juice, Water, Mineral Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Steric Acid, Beeswax, Tocopherol (Antioxidant), Olive Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Carbomar, Phenoxyethanol.

name: Three Item Bath Gift Set
description:
This 3 item gift set is shown in the Plumeria Flower scent, but it can be ordered in any Red Leaf scent, just let me know! If you'd like it sent to the recipient directly, contact me and l'll take care of that for you.

This Red Leaf bath gift set is discounted $7.00 over buying each item separately and is shipped discounted flat rate (within the U.S. only) for the best shipping rate. 

This set includes one each of Red Leafs bubble bath dough, beeswax body lotion, and room spray. Everything fits easily into the free matching gift bag for a quick and easy presentation with no gift wrapping necessary.

Bubble bath dough is easy to use and makes a ton of silky bubbles that last the entire bath! Beeswax lotion is excellent for dry skin, it absorbs quickly, and leaves skin soft but never greasy. The room spray is very concentrated, and one or two spritzes is all that's needed for fragrance that lasts for hours.

name: Aloe Vera Body Wash All Natural Vegan Shower Gel
description:
Red Leaf body wash is made using Aloe Vera instead of water as it's main ingredient. Just a little on a bath sponge or poof lasts your whole shower. Aloe vera leaves your skin soft and smooth without feeling dry after you towel off, and helps to soothe sensitive skin.

Your bottle should last months with daily use, just a little goes a long way. The lather does a great job of gently cleaning your skin and your bath poof will be full of foamy lather even when you're all done with your shower.

It's also an amazing liquid bubble bath!

Each bottle is made to order, with just the right amount of scent and the clear plastic bottle is recyclable. The label is coated so it wont peel off in the shower.

6 Oz bottle with flip top cap (silver cap is shown).

Ingredients:
Distilled Water, Aloe Vera Gel, Glycerin, Sodium Laureth Sulfate from coconut oil, Cellulose, Witch Hazel, Sodium Cholride, Methyl Paraben a preservative

name: Linen and Pillow Spray
description:
There's nothing like a bed with freshly scented sheets and pillows.

Just a few sprays will keep your sheets and pillows fresh smelling for days and it's safe for all fabrics. I use high quality and quick drying perfumers alcohol so your spray will leave behind only the fragrance and never a lingering alcohol after scent. Once sprayed, it takes about a minute to fully dry. 

It's a great way to re-fresh a shirt or blouse, just a spritz is enough.

PLEASE NOTE: Certain scents do discolor over time due to the natural essential oils in the fragrances. This will not cause your linens to be discolored or spotted when sprayed. It's a natural occurrence and normal for this product.

Each spray is 2 Oz's. Each bottle lasts about 6 months with weekly use.

Ingredients: Perfumers Alcohol, Essential Oils, Fragrance.

name: Over Sized Bar Soap, Vegan Soap Bar
description:
Discounted flat rate shipping automatically applies with your order of these vegan soap bars.

This heavy, over-sized soap bar is big enough to cut into two full sized bars! The shea butter and glycerin formula is great for extra sensitive skin, and the lather is lush with a creamy feel to it. It rinses squeeky clean, and the scent will linger for a few hours without being overpowering.

Each soap bar is 8+ Oz's. These are big heavy bars!

To Store: Keep it in as dry a place as possible when not in use. A wire shower rack or a soap dish with drainage is perfect for storage. It's best to keep it out of direct shower spray.

Ingredients:
olive oil, shea butter, coconut milk, water, kukui, vegetable glycerin, sodium hydroxide, sweet almond oil, fragrance

name: Mens Beeswax Hand and Body Lotion
description:
See the brand new men's scents at the bottom of this listing!

Mens heavy duty lotion with beeswax is an excellent, long lasting, and seriously moisturizing lotion that absorbs quickly and leaves rough skin feeling smooth and non-greasy. Perfect for mechanics, gardners, campers, it isn't greasy so you can get back to work fast. It's packaged in bottles with flat top caps, so just turn the bottle upside down when it runs low. There's no waste.

Please Note: This lotion does not contain sunscreen. 

6 Oz bottle with flip top cap.

NEW SCENTS:

LEATHER: The scent of a black leather jacket, it smells deep and musky. Perfect for a manly man. Very masculine and sensuous.

HI OCTANE: Based on the scent of jet fuel, this fragrance replicates the sharper and higher notes incorporating natural Tea Tree oil. It's musky and smooth, a powerful and sexy scent that's absolutely masculine. You'll be surprised how great this smells.

FIREWOOD: An amazing scent! The smoky and dense smell of burning hardwood. Smoky and deep, it's the perfect scent for Fall and Winter. A sexy, muscular and manly scent that works especially well in all mens products. You won't believe how fantastic this smells. You'll be wanting more of this, believe me! 

LO OCTANE: Based on the scent of gasoline, without smelling like gasoline itself. This scent incorporates the higher notes of gasoline and blends those with base notes of sage and rosemary. It's a surprisingly clean scent that smells amazing on the skin. Totally masculine and bold. 

Ingredients: Organic Aloe Vera leaf Juice, Water, Mineral Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Steric Acid, Beeswax, Tocopherol (Antioxidant), Olive Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Carbomar, Phenoxyethanol.

name: Vegan Aloe Vera Face lotion, Face Moisturizer
description:
This 100% vegan lotion is lightly scented and has an Aloe Vera base instead of water to help soothe dry skin with all day moisturization. 

It's light and non-greasy formula is made for extra sensitive skin. It absorbs quickly and rinses easily from your skin with just warm water. 
 
Each bottle is made to order and scented to not be overpowering, but the scent will linger lightly for a few hours. It's available in unscented too

My lotions are packaged in squeezable recycled plastic bottles with recycled flip top caps. When you run low just store the bottle upside down so the lotion isn't wasted!

Please Note: This lotion does not contain sunscreen! 6 Oz bottle.
